00028 /* Includes ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00029 #include "ht32.h"
00030 #include "ht32_board.h"
00031 #include "ht32_board_config.h"

00033 /** @addtogroup HT32_Series_Peripheral_Examples HT32 Peripheral Examples
00034   * @{

00046 /* Private constants ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00047 #define I2C_MASTER_ADDRESS     0x0A
00048 #define I2C_SLAVE_ADDRESS      0x60
00049 #define BufferSize             4
00050 #define ClockSpeed             100000
00051 
00052 /* Private function prototypes -----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00053 void I2CMaster_Configuration(void);
00054 void I2CSlave_Configuration(void);
00055 void I2C_Loopback(void);
00056 ErrStatus CmpBuffer(u8* Buffer1, u8* Buffer2, u32 BufferLength);
00057 
00058 /* Private variables ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00059 u8 I2C0_Master_Buffer_Tx[BufferSize] = {0x1, 0x2, 0x3, 0x4};
00060 u8 I2C0_Master_Buffer_Rx[BufferSize];
00061 u8 I2C1_Slave_Buffer_Rx[BufferSize];
00062 vu8 I2C0_Master_Tx_Index = 0;
00063 vu8 I2C0_Master_Rx_Index = 0;
00064 vu8 I2C1_Slave_Tx_Index = 0;
00065 vu8 I2C1_Slave_Rx_Index = 0;
00066 
00067 vu32 IsMasterRxFinish = FALSE;
00068 
00069 /* Global functions ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00070 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00071   * @brief  Main program.
00072   * @retval None
00073   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00074 int main(void)
00075 {
00076   HT32F_DVB_LEDInit(HT_LED1);
00077   HT32F_DVB_LEDInit(HT_LED2);
00078 
00079   I2CMaster_Configuration();
00080   I2CSlave_Configuration();
00081 
00082   /* The I2C master-slave state is checked by interrupt and data is sent from the master to the slave.      */
00083   I2C_Loopback();
00084 
00085   while (1);
00086 }
00087 
00088 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00089   * @brief  Configure the I2C.
00090   * @retval None
00091   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00092 void I2CMaster_Configuration(void)
00093 {
00094   { /* Enable peripheral clock                                                                              */
00095     CKCU_PeripClockConfig_TypeDef CKCUClock = {{0}};
00096     CKCUClock.Bit.I2C0 = 1;
00097     CKCUClock.Bit.AFIO = 1;
00098     CKCU_PeripClockConfig(CKCUClock, ENABLE);
00099   }
00100 
00101   /* Configure AFIO as I2C function                                                                         */
00102   AFIO_GPxConfig(I2C_MASTER_SCL_GPIO_ID, I2C_MASTER_SCL_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_I2C);
00103   AFIO_GPxConfig(I2C_MASTER_SDA_GPIO_ID, I2C_MASTER_SDA_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_I2C);
00104 
00105   { /* I2C Master configuration                                                                             */
00106 
00107     /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00108        Notice that the local variable (structure) did not have an initial value.
00109        Please confirm that there are no missing members in the parameter settings below in this function.
00110     */
00111     I2C_InitTypeDef  I2C_InitStructure;
00112 
00113     I2C_InitStructure.I2C_GeneralCall = DISABLE;
00114     I2C_InitStructure.I2C_AddressingMode = I2C_ADDRESSING_7BIT;
00115     I2C_InitStructure.I2C_Acknowledge = DISABLE;
00116     I2C_InitStructure.I2C_OwnAddress = I2C_MASTER_ADDRESS;
00117     I2C_InitStructure.I2C_Speed = ClockSpeed;
00118     I2C_InitStructure.I2C_SpeedOffset = 0;
00119     I2C_Init(I2C_MASTER_PORT, &I2C_InitStructure);
00120   }
00121 
00122   /* Enable I2C Matser interrupts                                                                           */
00123   I2C_IntConfig(I2C_MASTER_PORT, I2C_INT_STA | I2C_INT_ADRS | I2C_INT_RXDNE | I2C_INT_TXDE, ENABLE);
00124   NVIC_EnableIRQ(I2C0_IRQn);
00125 
00126   I2C_Cmd(I2C_MASTER_PORT, ENABLE);
00127 }
00128 
00129 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00130   * @brief  Configure the I2C.
00131   * @retval None
00132   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00133 void I2CSlave_Configuration(void)
00134 {
00135   { /* Enable peripheral clock                                                                              */
00136     CKCU_PeripClockConfig_TypeDef CKCUClock = {{0}};
00137     CKCUClock.Bit.I2C1 = 1;
00138     CKCUClock.Bit.AFIO = 1;
00139     CKCU_PeripClockConfig(CKCUClock, ENABLE);
00140   }
00141 
00142   /* Configure AFIO as I2C function                                                                         */
00143   AFIO_GPxConfig(I2C_SLAVE_SCL_GPIO_ID, I2C_SLAVE_SCL_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_I2C);
00144   AFIO_GPxConfig(I2C_SLAVE_SDA_GPIO_ID, I2C_SLAVE_SDA_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_I2C);
00145 
00146   { /* I2C Slave configuration                                                                              */
00147 
00148     /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00149        Notice that the local variable (structure) did not have an initial value.
00150        Please confirm that there are no missing members in the parameter settings below in this function.
00151     */
00152     I2C_InitTypeDef  I2C_InitStructure;
00153 
00154     I2C_InitStructure.I2C_GeneralCall = DISABLE;
00155     I2C_InitStructure.I2C_AddressingMode = I2C_ADDRESSING_7BIT;
00156     I2C_InitStructure.I2C_Acknowledge = ENABLE;
00157     I2C_InitStructure.I2C_OwnAddress = I2C_SLAVE_ADDRESS;
00158     I2C_InitStructure.I2C_Speed = 0;
00159     I2C_InitStructure.I2C_SpeedOffset = 0;
00160     I2C_Init(I2C_SLAVE_PORT, &I2C_InitStructure);
00161   }
00162 
00163   /* Enable I2C Slave interrupts                                                                            */
00164   I2C_IntConfig(I2C_SLAVE_PORT, I2C_INT_ADRS | I2C_INT_RXDNE | I2C_INT_TXDE | I2C_INT_RXNACK, ENABLE);
00165   NVIC_EnableIRQ(I2C1_IRQn);
00166 
00167   I2C_Cmd(I2C_SLAVE_PORT, ENABLE);
00168 }
00169 
00170 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00171   * @brief  The I2C master-slave state is checked by interrupt and data is sent from the master to the slave.
00172   * @retval None
00173   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00174 void I2C_Loopback(void)
00175 {
00176   /* Send I2C START & I2C slave address for write                                                           */
00177   I2C_TargetAddressConfig(I2C_MASTER_PORT, I2C_SLAVE_ADDRESS, I2C_MASTER_WRITE);
00178 
00179   /* Wait until all data transmission is complete                                                           */
00180   while (!IsMasterRxFinish);
00181 
00182   /* Check on validity of received data on I2C Master & I2C Slave                                           */
00183   if (CmpBuffer(I2C0_Master_Buffer_Rx, I2C1_Slave_Buffer_Rx, BufferSize) == SUCCESS)
00184   {
00185     HT32F_DVB_LEDOn(HT_LED1);
00186   }
00187   else
00188   {
00189     HT32F_DVB_LEDOn(HT_LED2);
00190   }
00191 }
00192 
00193 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00194   * @brief  Compare two buffers.
00195   * @param  Buffer1, Buffer2: buffers to be compared.
00196   * @param  BufferLength: buffer's length
00197   * @retval SUCCESS or ERROR
00198   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00199 ErrStatus CmpBuffer(u8* Buffer1, u8* Buffer2, u32 BufferLength)
00200 {
00201   while (BufferLength--)
00202   {
00203     if (*Buffer1 != *Buffer2)
00204     {
00205       return ERROR;
00206     }
00207 
00208     Buffer1++;
00209     Buffer2++;
00210   }
00211 
00212   return SUCCESS;
00213 }
00214 
00215 #if (HT32_LIB_DEBUG == 1)
00216 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00217   * @brief  Report both the error name of the source file and the source line number.
00218   * @param  filename: pointer to the source file name.
00219   * @param  uline: error line source number.
00220   * @retval None
00221   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00222 void assert_error(u8* filename, u32 uline)
00223 {
00224   /*
00225      This function is called by IP library that the invalid parameters has been passed to the library API.
00226      Debug message can be added here.
00227      Example: printf("Parameter Error: file %s on line %d\r\n", filename, uline);
00228   */
00229 
00230   while (1)
00231   {
00232   }
00233 }
00234 #endif
